name: Fall Chain / 鏈落 － web
description:
(This is the web version of Fall Chain / 鏈落）

（For best experience please play ask someone to play with you)

You are treasure hunter twins. You are cursed by the ancient ones and step into a deadly trap. 

You are joined together by a cursed chain which will not only limit your movement, but also transfer the damage you take to the other twin.

You need to fall away from the deadly ceiling and avoid dangerous on the way down!

At the same time your treasure hunter instinct kicks in. You need to collect treasure alone the way down!

But be careful! If you fall too fast you will died!

(The 『LIN LOK』 in the game start menu is the romanization of Cantonese of the game's Chinese name 鏈落)

（A web version of the game developed by Alex Yam, Ace Lok and Kelvin Chan for GMTK game jam 2021)

(https://alexy369.itch.io/fallchain)
